casebody.data:
Argued April 23, STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. WILLIAM EVAN McLAY, Appellant. (No. 1901-C) 508 P2d 818 II. Clifford Looney, Yale, argued the cause for appellant. On the brief were Swan, Butler & Looney, Yale. John W. Burgess, Assistant Attorney General, Salem, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief were Lee Johnson, Attorney General, and John W. Osburn, Solicitor General, Salem.

affirmed April 23,

petition for rehearing denied May 30,

petition for review denied July 3, 1973

Before Schwab, Chief Judge, and Foley and Fort, Judges.
